title: Why do people like Shawn Mendes? - Quora

response.answer_text: he’s the sweetest 19 year old ever!! go watch ‘Nat time’ on YouTube and her videos on shawn. Shawn loves his fans. Unlike many celebrities, he stops and takes pictures with them. I’ve met him on 2 occasions briefly. At the airport, around 400–500 people easily. All waiting for one guy. We were all singing passionately and with our hearts out, our voices ready to screaming and arms ready to snuggle with the dude. We were all in love with the same guy. He had the body, face, looks and talent. He IS actually talented. I wOULD show you a video from the concert but I can’t put on videos here. There were 5k crazy fans in one place and dare I say, there was enough love there than if you took out that crowd and calculated the love in the entire country! Shawn is a sweet guy, he has close friendships that are very notable. John Mayer, Charlie Puth, Niall Horan, Camila Cabello, many more( I dare not say Dhhrhshsh’s name) the fandom is also extremely nice to each other.  It’s very cute . I’ve made SO many friendships in this fandom and I’m now known as the ‘crazy shawn girl’ in my school of 4000! Shawn is also very kind, he often helps charities when he has free time. He said that instead of an artist to fan relationship, we have a person to person relationship with him. We love him because of his attitude. My Friend asked me very curiously “ if shawn was ugly, old, broke, not famous but loved you dearly, wanted to be your boyfriend, Husband, baby daddy, would you accept?” “HEAVENS YES!! The body, face(looks), fame, money are all bonuses! His attitude and self is enough for me! I love him, it isn’t lust. He’s genuine. Take notes, boys.
